H0.text: What word makes new words as a prefix with the words cover, line, code and ship. Soft

H1.text: What word makes new words as a prefix with the words cover, line, code and ship. Fast

H2.text: What word makes new words as a prefix with the words cover, line, code and ship. Light

H3.text: What word makes new words as a prefix with the words cover, line, code and ship. Hard

A4.text: Hardcover books are often printed on acid-free paper, and they are much more durable than paperbacks.

A5.text: Hardcover books are usually sold at higher prices than comparable paperbacks.
